20101223070816.000|20101223070817.000|CC1|THE AREA IN CASE SOMETHING      
20101223070817.000|20101223070817.000|CC1|HAPPENS.                        
20101223070817.000|20101223070818.000|CC1|WE'RE THOUGHT OUT OF THE WOODS  
20101223070818.000|20101223070821.000|CC1|AT ALL DUE TO THE FACT THAT     
20101223070821.000|20101223070822.000|CC1|WE'VE SEEN SLIDES HISTORICALLY

20101223070829.000|20101223070838.000|CC1|AREA, WATCHING THE HILLSIDES.   
20101223070838.000|20101223070839.000|CC1|>> Reporter: L.A. COUNTY FIRE   
20101223070839.000|20101223070841.000|CC1|CREWS KEPT A CLOSE EYE ON       
20101223070841.000|20101223070844.000|CC1|OCEANVIEW BOULEVARD, WHERE      
20101223070844.000|20101223070845.000|CC1|RESIDENTS WERE EVACUATED.

20101223070846.000|20101223070847.000|CC1|RETURN TO THEIR HOMES.
